website_summaries.verdict: The Reebok CrossFit Nano 6.0 has been regarded as one of the best CrossFit shoes in the market. Testers claimed that it was stable during heavy lifts but still provided the needed flexibility for cardio exercises and plyometrics. The style and durability were also highly praised. However, there were grievances about the durability of the trainer. But overall, this model came highly recommended by the CrossFit enthusiasts.
pros: The Reebok CrossFit Nano 6.0 was described as one of the most comfortable training shoes by the majority of owners
Droves of testers were ecstatic about the fit
it was roomy at the forefoot while the heel remained snug
The trainer was commended for its stability during weight training by a large number of individuals
The flexible forefoot delighted fitness aficionados because it made running and jumping a breeze, according to numerous people
Many shoppers liked the style of the footgear
they loved that there were not too many prints on the upper
The product was considered stable by plenty of buyers
cons: There were quality issues noted by multiple individuals like the synthetic overlay on the toe peeling, eyelet tearing, and the sole unit detaching or deteriorating after a few months of use
The insole irked some folks because it moved out of place

customer_reviews.title: One of the All Time Best
customer_reviews.text: If you love crossfit than you know the Nano series can have love hate relationship. These 6 are one of the all time best shoes you can get for crossfit and lifting in general. They are flat and stable for all olympic lifts and of course great for metcon WODS (running ☺️as well), the fit is impeccable so size them the same are your other crossfit shoes. Nike Metcon fit me size 9 m, Nano fit 9 m, Legacy Lifter 9m True to size plus they look pretty cool
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Build quality In question. Sized small for me.
customer_reviews.text: I had to return my normal size 11.5 for a 12 and they were still too small in the length of the toe box. 2 months after wearing them daily, they began to peel apart where the seem is glued on the heel. Very disappointing for such expensive and good looking shoes. I hope I can fix them so they don't keep taking apart, since I can't return then anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Motaf

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes I’ve owned
customer_reviews.text: F.I.R.E Very pleased with these. I had the nano 7s for a few years and these blow them out of the water. Fit is true to size (at least for me). Super comfortable. Really solid base. Good grip. So much better to run in. Trivial but they look a million times better. They feel lighter and less bulky to me. 10/10 would recommend to a friend. Disclaimer: only on day 6
customer_reviews.author: chris birdsey

customer_reviews.title: I like the fit and stability.
customer_reviews.text: Fit runs true to size. Toe box is quite large with mid and heel fitting a bit tighter which fits my foot well. Very stable. I'm using these for Olympic lifts and they plant solid on splits and grip the floor nicely.
customer_reviews.author: R. Todd Gatesh

customer_reviews.title: Love, but sole coming off.
customer_reviews.text: Love these but after little use the sole is coming off. These have been a game changer in my lifting, but after only a short time wearing them (still like new, only worn inside for 30ish mins a few times a week) the sole is coming unglued. While yes I can super glue them, I don’t have much faith that they won’t continue down to the rest of the sole.
customer_reviews.author: asned

customer_reviews.title: Great workout shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe. Very supportive, minimal flex and generous toe box. I use it for working out as well as walking around and I have yet to feel any discomfort. Its a tiny bit on the small side but not enough to cause any problems. Might want to go up a half size.
customer_reviews.author: Tougeskyite

customer_reviews.title: Best training shoes that i've ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: Best training shoes that I've ever owned. Great quality. Very comfortable and durable. They have a layer of kevlar which makes it a great addition if you like to climb a rope.
customer_reviews.author: Filip

customer_reviews.title: My 2nd pair
customer_reviews.text: Greatest gym shoes ever. First pair still usable after 2 years but the sole fabric finally wore out and rolled down. I got compliments on them a couple times too.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: The rarest nano 6.0
customer_reviews.text: I honestly love the Nano 6.0. 1st of all I would never thought about finding nano 6.0 ever again...they fit perfect..love the colour..very comfortable..I can see the difference when I workout..perfect for any WoD..the gum sole is just perfect. I am going to order an extra pair. I would also like to thank the supplier..the package arrived sooner than the actual delivery time to APO, address military base in Afghanistan. Thank you once again.
customer_reviews.author: Jabar

customer_reviews.title: Best workout shoes ever made
customer_reviews.text: I feel like Reebok struck the perfect balance between comfort and stability with these shoes. I had purchased the Nano 7 and 8, and ended up throwing out both pairs when I found out I could buy the 6s again on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Rezvani

customer_reviews.title: An honest review
customer_reviews.text: I get compliments on them all the time! They are so comfortable and I’ve had no issues doing cardio, double under or lifts. Previous comments made me paranoid about the shoe coming apart but so far they haven’t had any issues. Shoe fits true to size and I wear a 10.5. I would order these again.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Need a half size bigger or wide width.
customer_reviews.text: Good QA. Finish is clean. Heel is very solid, locks your heel in without a tight clamp around your ankles. Fits a bit small, my outer toes are squeezed.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Oare

customer_reviews.title: Reebok nano 6
customer_reviews.text: Best shoe I’ve worn, I also have the nano 3 which I use for CrossFit. I bought these to use on a turf field and they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Reebok
customer_reviews.text: Best workout shoes I've ever used. They fit great, look good and are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: tony

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my boyfriend recently. He owned a pair when they first came out and loved them. He wore them for so many years until the sole ran out and it started getting holes. The shoe lasted longer than any shoe he’s seen so I decided to replace his favorite shoe.
customer_reviews.author: kim sterrett

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. So great. Wide toe box so your toes can spread, zero drop. Durable, comfortable, and the gum bottom is sexy as hell.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Riddell

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for cross training
customer_reviews.text: Comfy AF. Natural feel for Olympic lifts, and still good cushioning for running as well. Haven’t tested the Kevlar against many rope climbs, but the overall construction of them instills great faith in their ability to take an ass whooping. 10/10 would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Chris Claudio

customer_reviews.title: Shoes for your feet
customer_reviews.text: My second pair of nanos. Hands down the most comfortable action shoe I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son- true size. A little extra room in the toes, but necessary for WODs. Great price. Great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: MJLivingood

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, definitely recommend despite being older style.
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended. Great fit. Use mine 5x a week and they are holding up great so far. Only con is the toe cap has a slight separation about an inch long where it meets the mesh upper, but not a big issue. Just looks like it wasn’t adhered really well in one spot. Mostly an aesthetics issue.
customer_reviews.author: Kai

customer_reviews.title: that it fits!
customer_reviews.text: comfort use it for free weight training and walking on treadmill!!
customer_reviews.author: Marty Reynoso

customer_reviews.title: Look great and work perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for the gym. Not disappointed. Fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Best CrossFit shoes made so far. These are the most comfortable not only for working out but everyday wear as well.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Otto

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Best nano ever. Also the last year they made the nanos look like nanos and not the Nike metcon.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Wack
customer_reviews.text: I used the product during 2 of my crossfit classes. The sole in the front of the shoe didnt connect all the way and there was a gap inbetween the tip of the shoe and the sole. Extreamly uncomfortable especially when running. Honestly felt like a knock of version of nando's I've previously owned.
customer_reviews.author: matthew kaczinski

customer_reviews.title: Great CrossFit shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Feel great in the gym, grippy during box jumps, role climbs, and all around.
customer_reviews.author: Wynter

customer_reviews.title: Insoles too small
customer_reviews.text: The insoles are I size too small. Might have been a mistake. I already had a pair of these. Same size. (9.5) so I know they fit. I took the insoles of the shoe I had and put it next to these insoles and these are noticeable smaller. My toe is sliding off the front of the insole. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: John Guidotti

customer_reviews.title: perfect for lifting.
customer_reviews.text: love them. I have 8 pairs of the nano 6s.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: My second pair... love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. I wish they still made them as I'm not a huge fan of the newer Nanos. Thankfully I found another pair on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Prime Member

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the CrossFit Nano 6.0, but need to upsize from 10.5 to 11. Otherwise, very nice and well built. Hey, maybe my feet are getting bigger.
customer_reviews.author: King Gut

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: For someone who works out every day and has tried all types of shoes. These are up there with some of the best. They have a wider toe which comes in clutch. Good for lifting or cardio.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Lind

customer_reviews.title: Love the Fit and The Shoe but Construction sucked
customer_reviews.text: SO I have had several pairs of Nanos to include another pair of Nano 6.0 but these are a real let down. After Daily wear and no workouts over the two weeks I have owned them the Kevlar covering on the Right shoe toe section is de-laminating. It is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: James L. Clements

customer_reviews.title: Great !! Worthy shoe
customer_reviews.text: It’s beyond my expectation. It has got everything non slippery, gripping and tough shoe for the all purpose I would say. I guess the chefs should also use these kind of shoes at the work place. Finally!!! 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Pradeep Pillai

customer_reviews.title: Happy feet
customer_reviews.text: I have to say this shoe fits perfect. Fits exactly your shoe size. I use this shoe for kick boxing and hit style classes it works perfect. It stays on my feet tight as I kick bags and spar with trainer.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Love this shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome overall shoe. Great for lifting and short sprints or runs. Great for rope climbs as well.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Vollmer

customer_reviews.title: Great for everyday!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes!! I’ve bought several! Great to work in for 12 hours and to workout in!! I only wish I had more color selections!!
customer_reviews.author: Tony M.

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: A little small compared to my last pair of Nanos (I wear 11’s), but I like the soles
customer_reviews.author: toen316

customer_reviews.title: dope shoe but what’s dis?
customer_reviews.text: can anyone tell me how this green piece got here and if it’s a big deal? besides looking silly it doesn’t seem to causing an issue. i’m wondering if it will eventually cause a problem
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie

customer_reviews.title: Buy them
customer_reviews.text: Well made, very comfortable. Good for lifting and short runs
customer_reviews.author: derek a horne

customer_reviews.title: These are a good pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are comfortable, stable and all around good shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Flexible not ridged
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable, fit like a glove and of course having a flat bottom is great for CrossFit all the while being flexible
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved these. The size was accurate and the shoe was nice.
customer_reviews.author: Bibi4sure

customer_reviews.title: fits great!
customer_reviews.text: I have very wide feet and the nanos always fit well but this shoe is by far my favorite yet!
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: They run a half of a size small.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoes. They do run a little small, so I had to bump up half a size and now they are super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: DannR.

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: The sizing chart is off. I’ll have to send this back like the last ones and go up another size.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Best nanos ever made
customer_reviews.text: Best workout shoes I've ever owned. Better than nano 4, nano7, or nano 8.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than the 8s
customer_reviews.text: I bought these and the nano 8 at the same time and these are night and day better!!!
customer_reviews.author: theBESTchild

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his new CrossFit shoes. Thanks for delivering on timr
customer_reviews.author: Jo Anna Barnard

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best trainers ever made. Incredibly stable and responsive when getting under heavy weight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: All around a great training shoe. Plus it looks great on feet!
customer_reviews.author: BMagaling

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are the best Nanos that Reebok has made imho. These were a steal at $83.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Schroff

product_meta.title: Reebok Men's Crossfit Nano 6.0 Cross Trainer
product_meta.description: You don't climb a rope 10 times to get better at climbing a rope. You climb it because you want to be better you. Stay fearless and confident with new sandpapertextured material built with Kevlar fiber and RopePro+ technology in our CrossFit Nano update. The reengineered anatomical shape helps...
feature_bullets: DURABLE AND LIGHTWEIGHT MATERIAL: These sandpaper textured shoes with mesh upper helps provide durability and lightweight strength; Flex grooves for increased flexibility
EFFICIENT FOOT SUPPORT: These stylish trainers with compression-molded midsole for cushioning and shock absorption; RopePro midfoot teeth add traction and bite for rope climbs
COMFORTABLE AND STURDY DESIGN: This footwear features a low-cut design that provides freedom of motion and quicker transitions
HIGH-PERFORMANCE SPORT SHOES: This Reebok footwear comes with raised lug pattern on the rubber outsole for traction; Ideal for workouts, high-intensity sessions, and cardio
